item.title: Server-less Slack Bot Token Rotation
item.description: Have you ever wanted to manually setup Slack bot token rotation with server-less infrastructure in AWS?

item.title: Hawk - Tooling for Office 365 Log Gathering
item.description: When responding to an incident involving compromised O365 credentials, the hardest part can often be gathering all the logs required to determine the root cause.
